page.title: 15POLITICS
page.content: Rainworth has no separate Labour Party but joins with Blidworth Labour Party, which was established in 1926.It meets once a month.Its activities being concerned with local and national political issues,speakers often being invited to address the meeting.Eleven members serve on the parish council, six on the district council and one on the county council.People of a Conservative persuasion meet once a month in Ravenshead.There is no S.D.P. or Liberal Party in Rainworth.There is a Liberal Party which meets at Ravenshead,and there is a monthly meeting at Calverton.There is an area meeting every three months at Ollerton.
